metadata.title: RHSA-2022:9110: OpenShift Container Platform 4.9.54 packages and security update (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private cloud deployments.

This advisory contains the RPM packages for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.9.54. See the following advisory for the container images for this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2022:9111

Security Fix(es):

* jenkins-plugin: Arbitrary file write vulnerability in Pipeline Input Step Plugin (CVE-2022-34177)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: Arbitrary file write vulnerability in Pipeline Input Step Plugin

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
